name: Plan adopted
description: The date the plan is adopted, and becomes the development  plan to use in decision making within the planning  authority

name: Planning inspectorate report published
description: The date the Inspectors Report, that includes  recommendations and reasoning, is published

name: Submit plan for examination
description: The date the Local Plan is submitted to the Planning  Inspectorate (PINS) for examination.
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provide this event

name: Draft plan for public consultation published
Planning inspectorate examination start
description: Date the Planning Inspectorate start their  examination.
notes: Ideally the planning inspectorate would be able to provide this event data.

name: Planning inspectorate examination end
description: The date the examination finished.
notes: Ideally the planning inspectorate would be able to provide this event data

name: Planning inspectorate found sound
description: The date the planning inspectorate found the plan  to be sound.
notes: Ideally the planning inspectorate would provide this event data

name: Local development scheme published
description: The date the local development scheme (LDS) was published. The LDS sets out the timescale for the adoption of development plan documents
notes: LPAs are expected to provide this event.

name: Estimated draft plan for public consultation published
Regulation 18 draft local plan published
description: The date a Draft Local Plan is published prior to the  beginning of the consultation period.
notes: Planning authorities should provide this event

name: Regulation 18 public consultation start
description: The date a regulation 18 public consultation starts.  Relevant organisations are invited to make  representations, and the consultation opens to the  public
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provide this event

name: Regulation 18 public consultation end
description: The end of the Regulation 18 consultation period.
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provide this event

name: Regulation 19 publication local plan published
description: The date the publication Local Plan is published.  This is the plan the planning authority intends to  submit for examination
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provide this event

name: Regulation 19 public consultation start
description: The start of a regulation 19 public consultation.  During reg 19, representations are sought in relation  to the Local Plan's soundness and legal compliance
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provide this event

name: Regulation 19 public consultation end
description: The end of the Regulation 19 consultation period.
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provied this event

name: Estimated date regulation 18 draft local plan published
description: An estimated date for when the regulation 18 draft local plan will be published

name: Estimated regulation 18 public consultation end
description: An estimated date for when the regulation 18 public consultation will end

name: Estimated regulation 19 public consultation start
description: An estimated date for when the regulation 19 public consultation will start

name: Estimated regulation 19 public consultation end
description: An estimated date for when the regulation 19 public consultation will end

name: Estimated regulation 18 public consultation start
description: An estimated date for when the regulation 18 public consultation will start

name: Estimated date regulation 19 publication local plan published
description: An estimated date for when the publication local plan for regulation 19 will be published

name: Estimated plan adoption date
description: The target date for adoption of the plan
notes: Planning authorities are expected to provide this forecast
